translations: v.撕裂；伤害；严重抨击（lacerate 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 拉力试验机, 切碎装置
割裂挥砍, 撕裂削砍

sentences.sentence: Guy talking on cell phone walks into street sign also lacerating his head.
sentences.translation: 有人走在街上手机通话撞到了街头显示牌，弄伤了头部。

sentences.sentence: Guy talking on cell phone walks into street sign, also lacerating his head.
sentences.translation: 另一个一边走路一边打手机的家伙撞到了街道指示牌上，也划破了头。

sentences.sentence: It was Lowell who was the roaring, self-lacerating, tragic king of the poetry jungle.
sentences.translation: 而洛威尔恰恰是诗歌丛林中怒吼着、把自己刺痛得血淋淋的悲剧之王。
